summary: Frontend theme testing completed for Dark Navy Modern theme change. Login page and Admin Dashboard sidebar properly updated to blue. However, User Panel and dropdowns still contain purple colors that need to be changed to blue.

ui_bugs.issue: Button uses purple styling (rgba(139, 92, 246)) instead of blue
Tabs use purple styling (rgba(139, 92, 246)) instead of blue
Dropdown border uses purple (rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.35)) and box-shadow has purple glow instead of blue

issues: CH:2 SignalWire button has purple background and text color
Call Steps tabs (S1, S2, S3, Accept, Retry) have purple styling
Provider tabs background uses purple gradient
Lines 179-182: glass-input:focus uses purple border and shadow
Lines 253-264: glass-table-header and glass-table-row use purple colors
Lines 180, 200-202: form-label and form-input:focus use purple colors
Lines 324-327, 342-354: status-finished and log-entry use purple colors
Lines 549-583: scrollbar and provider-tab use purple colors
Lines 636-732: glass-dropdown and Radix dropdown styles use purple

passed_tests: Login page - dark navy background (#0a0e1a) applied correctly
Login page - blue gradient accent on left side visible
Login page - Sign In button is blue (rgb(37, 99, 235))
Login page - 'Sign up' link is blue
Login page - no purple colors detected in computed styles
Admin Dashboard - sidebar uses blue colors for active state
Admin Dashboard - Dashboard button has blue background (rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.15))
Admin Dashboard - dark navy background applied
Dropdowns - selected option highlight is blue (rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.25))
action_items: Update App.js lines 1246-1263: Change CH:2 SignalWire button from purple to blue styling
Update App.js lines 1444-1474: Change Call Steps tabs from purple to blue styling
Update App.css lines 636-732: Change dropdown border and shadow from purple to blue

Update index.css: Replace all purple color references (#8b5cf6, #a78bfa, #a855f7, rgba(139, 92, 246), rgba(167, 139, 250), rgba(168, 85, 247)) with blue equivalents (#3b82f6, #60a5fa, #2563eb, rgba(59, 130, 246))
Update App.css: Replace all purple color references with blue equivalents
critical_code_review_comments: Theme change is incomplete - only AuthPage.jsx and AdminDashboard.jsx sidebar were updated
App.js (User Panel) still has extensive purple styling in provider tabs and call steps
index.css has purple colors in glass effects, glow buttons, neon text, and table styles
App.css has purple colors in form inputs, log entries, tabs, scrollbars, and dropdowns
Radix UI dropdown styles in both CSS files use purple border and shadow colors

success_rate.frontend: 40% (Login page and Admin sidebar pass, User Panel and dropdowns fail)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Theme change from purple to blue is incomplete. Login page and Admin Dashboard sidebar are correctly blue. User Panel (App.js) and CSS files (index.css, App.css) still contain extensive purple color references that need to be updated to blue. Key purple colors to replace: #8b5cf6, #a78bfa, #a855f7, rgba(139, 92, 246), rgba(167, 139, 250), rgba(168, 85, 247). Replace with blue: #3b82f6, #60a5fa, #2563eb, rgba(59, 130, 246).
